resources.string: "To detect and neutralise viruses more effectively, we'll upload the apps' package names and properties in order to scan them using a cloud engine."
This feature is powered by a third party antivirus engine. To learn more, read the License Agreement provided by the third party.

"When you're performing a security scan, your device model and scan results will be uploaded to %1$s servers and used in accordance with the corresponding terms and conditions.

Read and agree to %3$s's terms and conditions before performing security scans.

If you don't agree to upload data to %4$s servers, you can still use the virus definitions stored locally on your device."

"The system can show when apps launched other apps, autostarted, used permissions, and performed sensitive actions. Due to Android version compatibility issues, some of these records might not be accurate. If you find an app behaviour record that isn't accurate, report it to us using the \"Services & feedback\" app."
Turn on app behaviour records to understand how apps use your personal information.
"Turn on to view the behaviour of basic system services. To ensure the stability of the system, these services will use the required permissions some of which can't be restricted."
Only allow the app to access its own files and data
"Allowing an app to autostart may increase the amount of memory and battery life it uses. Your device will optimise the autostart permissions of apps you don't use frequently to improve performance."
"This feature will optimise the autostart permissions of apps you don't use frequently to improve device performance."
Automated action will be cancelled in %d seconds
Automatically identify and centre faces in video calls and meetings. This feature is not supported by some apps.
Turn on to show conversation bubbles for minimised apps as on-screen comments
Conversation bubbles for minimised apps will be shown as on-screen comments

"Welcome to Security! You can use Security and its modules (including system security components, system services, Joyose, and Cleaner) to free up storage space, scan your device for viruses, control battery usage, optimise your device for gaming, manage apps, receive earthquake early warnings, and more. System security components will connect to the internet and perform security scans while you're installing apps and making payments."

"Welcome to Security! You can use Security and its modules (including system security components, security and system services, Joyose, and Cleaner) to free up storage space, scan your device for viruses, control battery usage, optimise your device for gaming, manage apps, receive earthquake early warnings, and more. System security components will connect to the internet and perform security scans while you're installing apps and making payments."
For using blocklist and recognising messages from your carrier
For providing the features relevant to your location in Warning Centre, Emergency SOS, App battery saver, payment security scanner, and approximate location service
"%1$s can't use mobile data when roaming. When you're roaming, only apps you've added to exceptions can use mobile data."
Your carrier may charge you additional fees for using data while roaming.
A few items can be optimised
<Data>Cleaner can free up <font color=#0099ff>%s</font> of storage space. Clean now?</Data>
"Your device's performance score is lower than 80 points. Optimise now?"
"Your device's performance score is lower than 75 points. Optimise now?"
Turn off Aeroplane mode to be able to make calls and connect to the network
"· Tap an app on the sidebar to open it in a floating window. · Drag an app to the centre of the screen to open it in a floating window or to the side to use Split screen."

"Can't switch to Balanced mode in Game Turbo when system-wide Performance mode is on. You can change battery settings in Security.
Open Security"

"Updated content for this game can be downloaded to this device automatically after you connect to WLAN and turn the screen off. Thus, you'll be able to use the new version as soon as it's released.

Read and agree to the Statement on background updates before using this feature."
"Colour animations will be displayed when pop-up triggers are on and you're playing games"

"To be able to detect security risks and protect your data, we need to collect the necessary amount of information about your device. Read and agree to our Privacy Policy before using our services. In case you don't allow us to collect such information, you'll still be able to use this app, but some features won't be available to you. "

"· Tap an app on the sidebar to open it in a floating window. · Drag an app to the centre of the screen to open it in a floating window or to the side to use Split screen. · Press and hold the indicator to move the window around."
Clear cache automatically to optimise gaming
"I've read and agreed to Xunyou Game Booster Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agreed to Xunyou Game Voice Changer Privacy Policy."
Game Turbo is optimising your gaming experience now
Try Ultimate mode in Game Turbo to take your gaming to the next level
Customise Battery saver settings for individual apps
Prevent selected items from being optimised
Ask your permission before allowing apps to read your contacts, view your call history, change system settings or access camera and other device resources
Place features on your home screen
Use a keyboard authorised by Xiaomi
This feature is intended for developers and might not be convenient for general users. Turning off system optimisation might bring about the following changes:
"Try optimising network connection when it's unstable"

To keep track of data usage by app, we collect information such as package names, WLAN and mobile data usage, peak and off-peak data usage, and when WLAN and mobile data is on. This information is stored locally on your device.

Virtual IDs (OAID) can be used for tracking your behaviour and personalising ads for you. You can select which apps are allowed to access your virtual ID. Note that if you restrict access, ad recommendations might become irrelevant or apps might not be able to work normally.
"Couldn't recognise your carrier and location. Can't set phone balance and data usage warnings now."

"Turn on to speed up the charging process. This feature will prioritise charging speed while ensuring your device's safety. The lower your battery is, the faster it will be charged. This feature might heat up your device."
"When permission manager is off, apps won't ask your permission before reading your contacts, viewing your call history, changing system settings or accessing camera and other device resources."
"This permission allows apps to detect the device's position in space, recognise shaking, and determine screen orientation."

"Apps won't ask your permission before reading your contacts, viewing your call history, changing system settings or accessing camera and other device resources. You can turn this feature on in Permission settings."
Permissions related to phone calls, contact info and call history.
Optimise your device to save battery
Looks like battery health is low. Check your battery in an authorised service centre.
When Battery saver is on, the following optimisations will be performed:
Prioritise performance over power consumption and temperature control

Looks like an unauthorised battery is installed in this device. Charging power will be lowered to protect your device. Using unauthorised batteries may result in battery swelling, overheating, and leakage. It may also cause fire or other hazards. Find an authorised service provider to replace your battery.
This device was equipped with a built-in battery that should only be replaced by an authorised service provider.

Replacing the battery elsewhere may damage this device. Using unauthorised batteries may result in battery swelling, overheating, and leakage. It may also cause fire or other hazards. Do not use unauthorised batteries.
"Health info isn't available for this unauthorised battery. Tap to learn about security risks."
Risks caused by using unauthorised batteries
Looks like your battery is fully charged most of the time, which may speed up its aging. Optimised charging is now turned on to avoid such problems.
Dark mode changes the colour scheme of the system UI and selected apps allowing you to save battery and reduce eye strain.
Dark mode changes the colour scheme of the system UI and selected apps allowing you to save battery and reduce eye strain
Turn on Battery saver to apply multiple system optimisations that limit background activity
"Battery saver is on. It reduces apps' background activity, stops sync, and minimises system animations."
"Turn on Battery saver to reduce apps' background activity, stop sync, and minimise system animations."
Optimise system settings to save battery

Security needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with its services and be able to improve its features. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Security in the Settings at any time.

"Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Security. If you don't agree to use the aforementioned services, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you."

Android has multiple high-risk permissions (e.g. the permission to send you push notifications). To protect your privacy, the system will ask whether you allow such behaviour, and provide restriction options.
Instead of your real identifier, the system will provide a virtual ID (OAID) to third party apps. It prevents apps from tracking your behaviour and preferences and protects your privacy.

We are committed to respecting and protecting your privacy. Prioritising research and development in the field of information security, Xiaomi constantly works on improving the methods, practices, and technical solutions that safeguard your data. We also share our latest achievements with our partners in order to ensure your privacy across the board.
Withdrawal of consent and service cancellation
"You won't be able to keep using %1$s unless you agree to the new version of its Privacy Policy. Agree to the updated %2$s Privacy Policy now?"
Read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue.
"You've authorised installing %1$s. You can continue once the installation package is detected."
Protect your device from unauthorised access
Place the device that supports Qi wireless charging (e.g. phone or wearable device) on the centre of the back of this device
"Looks like you're playing a game now. Scheduled power off is cancelled."
Learn your behaviour and automate actions
Allow apps to optimise battery usage in the background
You can add up to %1$s of storage to this device using our UFS storage extension technology and storage optimisation algorithms.

"We invite you to enroll in our User Experience Programme. This app needs to connect to the Internet and use the following permissions or features to collect stats in order to improve the services we provide to you. We collect data here only for statistical purposes, and we can't identify you personally based on the data we collect."
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue.
Read and agree to our Privacy Policy before you continue.
Read and agree to our User Agreement before you continue.
"If you don't want to grant these permissions, you can unenroll in Settings > Additional settings > Privacy > User Experience Programme."
Read and agree to our Privacy Policy before you continue.
You can sign out, uninstall this app, or revoke your authorisation in Security > Manage apps > Permissions > Permissions.
Read and agree to our User Agreement before you continue.
Go to the Data usage app in Security Centre and try again manually.
"Theatre mode provides an immersive viewing experience. Your device might heat up and consume more power."
Tap to switch to Theatre mode
"If you choose to ignore possible risks posed by an app, you'll no longer be notified about them. However, you should remember that it doesn't mean such risks are neutralised."
AI can recognise people, animals, plants, sky, buildings, and other objects featured in videos and dynamically enhance them.
